text: Tomaloke'i sraestha um'mata, manara jatira hidayatara babe yisakalaka uli'oraa haiche, (karana) tomaloke satkamara adesa diya arau asatkamara paraa nisedha karaa arau allahara prati bisbasa sthapana karaa. Arau ahale kitabasakale yadi imana anilehemtena tente sihamtara babe eya bhala haâ€™lehemtena. Sihamtara majata kichumana mumina ache; kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i phachikba
